name: Time spent on leisure, male (Statistics Norway)
description: Time spent on leisure, by males, on an average day. Leisure activities includes sports and outdoor activities, entertainment and culture, socialising, reading, television viewing, other leisure time, and travel connected to leisure time activities.
datasetName: Long run time use in Norway, by sex - Norway Statistics

source.name: Statistics Norway
source.additionalInfo: Note: Data are normalized to 1440 minutes per day. In other words, for those countries for which the time use does not sum up to 1440 minutes, the missing minutes are equally distributed across all activities.
